ygData.subject: Re: Searching in OOT, just sharks so far...
ygData.msgSnippet: I searced all over that tent with the dwarves on the sisters island. I saw no bags whatsoever, only 2 dwarves, a fire, and a tree stump with a forge on it. I
ygData.messageBody:
I searced all over that tent with the dwarves on the sisters island. I saw
no bags whatsoever, only 2 dwarves, a fire, and a tree stump with a forge on
it. I am on the Solusek Ro server. Is this only missing on my server? Or
maybe only select servers have this "secret button".



----- Original Message -----
From: kale eusi <kaleusi@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, October 08, 1999 10:57 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Searching in OOT, just sharks so far...


> From: "kale eusi" <kaleusi@...>
>
> >From: FizzBan <sragan@...>
> >
> >
> >The shark I found was due south of the 'sisters' isle and conned green to
> >me at 34. Its probably in the mid to high 20's. It didnt attack me.
> >
> >That was the only monster I found underwater so far, except perhaps for a
> >few wading cyclops =).
> >
> >"FizzWizz" of tunare
> >
>
> I've managed to piece this together from a lot of rumors... for all of you
> out there with a Fishbone Earring or such.... go to the sisters isle in
> OOT.... have someone find the dwarves at the forge (located on the isle)
and
> click on one of the bags located there (heard one is a secret button)...
you
> should hear a grating noise... the person with the earring should search
> under the water for an open secret passage that should be open now...
>
> Also, I heard there's a sunken ship somewhere possibly within the OOT or
> Erud's Crossing that is it's own zone. Perhaps one of these suggestions is
> what we seek?
>
> Again - I based all this off of various rumors I heard and pieced
together,
> plus the clue "search under the waves".
>
>
